Name: DPT_Switch_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_Bool_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_Enable_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_Ramp_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_Alarm_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_BinaryValue_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_Step_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_Direction1_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_Direction2_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_Start_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_State_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_Invert_Control
Interpretation range: C₁V₁ C = {0 (no control), 1 (control)}; V = {0,1} according to type 1.XXX

Name: DPT_DateTime
Interpretation range: U₈R₁R₁R₁R₁M₄R₁R₁R₁D₅W₃H₅R₁R₁S₆R₁R₁S₆E₁F₁G₁I₁J₁K₁L₁N₁O₁R₁R₁R₁R₁R₁R₁R₁ U = [0 … 255]; M = [1 … 12]; D = [1 … 31]; W = [0 … 7]; H = [0 … 24]; S = [0 … 59]; R = {0}; E,F,G,I,J,K,L,N,O = {0,1}

Name: DPT_Alarm_Reaction
Interpretation range: {00 (no alarm is used), 01 (alarm position is UP), 10 (alarm position is DOWN)}

Name: AlarmInfo
Interpretation range: U₈N₈V₈W₈P₂N₁M₁L₁K₁J₁I₁D₅C₁B₁A₁ U = [0 … 255]; N = [0 … 3]; V = [0 … 50]; W = [0 … 6]; P = {00}; D = {00000}; A,B,C,I,J,K,L,M,N = {0,1}

Name: MBus_Address
Interpretation range: U₁₆V₃₂W₈N₈ "MBus address", parameters U,V,W,N are manufacturer specific

Name: DPT_GeographicalLocation
Note: geographical location (longitude and latitude) expressed in degrees

Name: DPT_TempRoomSetpSetF16[4]
Note: Temperature setpoint setting for 4 HVAC Modes

Name: DPT_TempRoomSetpSetShiftF16[4]
Note: Temperature setpoint shift setting for 4 HVAC Modes

Name: DPT_ipv6
Note: IPv6 address encoded in the network byte order
